sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-container>
      <!-- Top Bar -->
      <v-app-bar app color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <!-- Burger menu icon -->
        <v-btn icon @click="drawer = !drawer">
          <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
        <!-- Title -->
        <v-toolbar-title>{{ userName }}</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <!-- Logout button -->
        <v-btn icon @click="logout">
          <v-icon>mdi-logout</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-app-bar>

      <!-- Sidebar -->
      <v-navigation-drawer app v-model="drawer" color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <v-list dense>
          <v-list-item
            v-for="(item, index) in sidebarItems"
            :key="index"
            @click="navigate(index)"
          >
            <v-list-item-action>
              <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-action>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>

      <!-- Main Content -->
      <v-main>
        <v-col cols="12" style="max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto">
          <v-card class="mx-auto" max-width="600">
            <v-card-title class="blue darken-2 white--text"
              >Asesorías</v-card-title
            >
            <v-card-text>
              <v-row>
                <v-col cols="12">
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model.number="numberOfAsesorias"
                    label="Number of Asesorías"
                    type="number"
                    :min="1"
                    :max="maxAsesoriasAllowed"
                    @change="initializeAsesorias"
                  ></v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-divider class="my-4"></v-divider>
                <v-col
                  v-for="(asesoria, index) in asesorias"
                  :key="asesoria.id"
                  cols="6"
                >
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="12">
                      <v-file-input
                        v-model="asesoria.file"
                        :label="'Upload File for Asesoría ' + (index + 1)"
                        prepend-icon="mdi-upload"
                        :disabled="asesoria.submitted"
                        accept="application/pdf"
                      ></v-file-input>
                    </v-col>
                    <!-- Delete button -->
                    <v-col v-if="asesoria.submitted" cols="12">
                      <v-btn color="red" fab small @click="deleteFile(index)">
                        <v-icon>mdi-delete</v-icon>
                      </v-btn>
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
            </v-card-text>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-btn
                color="blue darken-2"
                @click="submitFiles"
                :disabled="!allFilesUploaded"
              >
                Submit All
              </v-btn>
              <v-btn color="green darken-2" @click="downloadAllFiles">
                Download All Files
              </v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-main>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'
import JSZip from 'jszip'
import { saveAs } from 'file-saver'

export default {
  data () {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      sidebarItems: [
        { title: 'Proyecto', icon: 'mdi-folder-outline' },
        { title: 'Asesorias', icon: 'mdi-account-plus-outline' }
      ],
      userName: localStorage.getItem('userName'),
      numberOfAsesorias: 1,
      maxAsesoriasAllowed: 5, // Adjust this number based on your requirements
      asesorias: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('asesorias')) || [],
      userId: localStorage.getItem('id')
    }
  },
  computed: {
    allFilesUploaded () {
      return (
        this.asesorias.length === this.numberOfAsesorias &&
        this.asesorias.every((asesoria) => asesoria.file || asesoria.submitted)
      )
    }
  },
  methods: {
    navigate (index) {
      switch (index) {
        case 0:
          this.$router.push('/student')
          break
        case 1:
          this.$router.push('/student/asesorias')
          break
        default:
          break
      }
    },
    logout () {
      localStorage.removeItem('token')
      this.$router.push('/login')
    },
    initializeAsesorias () {
      this.asesorias = Array.from(
        { length: this.numberOfAsesorias },
        (v, i) => ({
          id: i + 1,
          file: null,
          submitted: this.asesorias[i]?.submitted || false // Set submitted status based on existing data
        })
      )
    },
    async submitFiles () {
      const formData = new FormData()
      const submittedIndexes = [] // Store the indexes of submitted files

      // Collect submitted files and their indexes
      this.asesorias.forEach((asesoria, index) => {
        if (asesoria.file && !asesoria.submitted) {
          formData.append('files', asesoria.file)
          submittedIndexes.push(index) // Store the index of submitted file
        }
      })

      try {
        const response = await axios.post(
          'http://localhost:3000/upload/multiple',
          formData,
          {
            headers: {
              'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
            }
          }
        )

        if (response.status === 201) {
          response.data.files.forEach((file, fileIndex) => {
            const index = submittedIndexes[fileIndex]
            if (index !== undefined) {
              this.asesorias[index].submitted = true
              this.asesorias[index].file.data = file.data
              this.asesorias[index].file.filename = file.filename
            }
          })

          // Save the updated asesorias data in localStorage
          localStorage.setItem('asesorias', JSON.stringify(this.asesorias))

          window.alert('Files uploaded successfully!') // Display alert
          console.log('Files uploaded successfully!')
        } else {
          console.error('Failed to upload files.')
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error uploading files:', error)
      }
    },

    async fetchAsesorias () {
      try {
        const response = await axios.get(
          `http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}`
        )
        const userData = response.data
        this.maxAsesoriasAllowed = userData.asesorias
        this.initializeAsesorias() // Initialize asesorias based on fetched number
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching asesorías:', error)
      }
    },
    async fetchFileData () {
      try {
        const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:3000/files')
        const files = response.data
        // Update file objects with their data based on index
        files.forEach((file, index) => {
          if (this.asesorias[index]) {
            this.asesorias[index].file = file
          }
        })
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching file data:', error)
      }
    },
    async downloadAllFiles() {
  const zip = new JSZip();

  this.asesorias.forEach((asesoria, index) => {
    if (asesoria.file && asesoria.file.data) {
      try {
        // Decode the base64 string
        const byteString = atob(asesoria.file.data);
        // Create an ArrayBuffer
        const ab = new ArrayBuffer(byteString.length);
        // Create a Uint8Array from the ArrayBuffer
        const ia = new Uint8Array(ab);
        // Assign the character codes to the Uint8Array
        for (let i = 0; i < byteString.length; i++) {
          ia[i] = byteString.charCodeAt(i);
        }
        // Use the unique ID for naming the file in the ZIP
        zip.file(`file_${asesoria.file.id}.pdf`, ia);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error decoding file data:', error);
      }
    }
  });

  try {
    const content = await zip.generateAsync({ type: 'blob' });
    saveAs(content, 'asesorias.zip');
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error generating ZIP:', error);
  }
},


    deleteFile (index) {
      const fileId = this.asesorias[index].file.id
      axios
        .delete(`http://localhost:3000/files/${fileId}`)
        .then((response) => {
          if (response.status === 200) {
            this.asesorias[index].submitted = false
            this.asesorias[index].file = null
            localStorage.setItem('asesorias', JSON.stringify(this.asesorias))
            window.alert('File deleted successfully!')
          } else {
            console.error('Failed to delete file.')
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error('Error deleting file:', error)
        })
    }
  },

  mounted () {
    this.fetchAsesorias()
    this.fetchFileData()
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-btn i {
  color: white;
}
</style>
